@Section

Package voyeur

Local Area Network Voyeur Application. 
<dependency>
  <groupId>dev.hcf</groupId>
  <artifactId>voyeur</artifactId>
  <version>2.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>

Spring Boot Artifacts

application.properties

# application.properties

application.name: voyeur
application.brand: voyeur
application.home: ${user.home}/.config/voyeur

ssdp.product: voyeur/2.0.0-SNAPSHOT

spring.main.banner-mode: OFF
spring.main.headless: false
spring.main.log-startup-info: false

spring.jackson.serialization.indent_output: true

spring.output.ansi.enabled: NEVER

spring.task.scheduling.pool.size: 4

logging.file.path: ${application.home}/log
logging.logback.rollingpolicy.max-file-size: 256KB
logging.logback.rollingpolicy.max-history: 8

management.endpoints.web.exposure.include: *
management.endpoints.enabled-by-default: true
management.endpoint.shutdown.enabled: true
Author:
Allen D. Ball
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ARPCache
    InetAddress to HardwareAddress Map.
    InetAddressMap<V>
    InetAddress Map abstract base class.
    Launcher
    SpringApplication Launcher.
    NetworkInterfaces
    Network interface Set and Service.
    Nmap
    InetAddress to nmap output Document Map.
    SSDP
    SSDPDiscoveryCache Service.
    UIController
    UI Controller implementation.
